general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply appropriate treatments for various diseases and pests. Ensure proper field surveillance and protection measures. Install heaters in poultry sheds during winter.

advisory: Nursery Management - Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Ensure proper irrigation and division of nursery area. Sow sprouted seeds with appropriate spacing.
Seed treatment - Treat the paddy seeds with recommended chemicals before sowing in the nursery.
Vegetative - Control yellow mosaic virus by spraying recommended chemicals.
Vegetative - Control yellow mosaic virus by spraying recommended chemicals.
Vegetative to fruiting - Manage wilting and fruit & shoot borer with appropriate treatments.
Vegetative to Curd formation stage - Manage Alternaria diseases with recommended chemicals.
Vegetative/Flowering - Control aphids and jassids infestation with recommended chemicals.
Vegetative/Flowering - Manage leaf eating caterpillar with biological or chemical control methods.
